verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* soul, put all \w your|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* God; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* comes \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* \w only|strong="H0389"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* Rock \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* high tower; \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* greatly moved.

How long \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* go \w on|strong="H0389"\w* designing evil against \w a|strong="H3808"\w* man? running against \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w as|strong="H0389"\w* against \w a|strong="H3808"\w* broken wall, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w on|strong="H0389"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* point \w of|strong="H6697"\w* falling?

\w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w* thought \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w put|strong="H7523"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H5186"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H0575"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* honour; \w their|strong="H3605"\w* delight \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* deceit: blessing \w is|strong="H0376"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* mouths \w but|strong="H0376"\w* cursing \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* hearts. (Selah.)

\w My|strong="H7130"\w* soul, \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w your|strong="H1288"\w* faith \w in|strong="H7130"\w* God; \w for|strong="H7130"\w* from \w him|strong="H1288"\w* comes \w my|strong="H7130"\w* hope.

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H0389"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* Rock \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* salvation; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* high tower; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* greatly moved.

\w In|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* glory; \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w Rock|strong="H6697"\w* \w of|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H6697"\w*, \w and|strong="H6697"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* safe place.

\w Have|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* all times, \w you|strong="H5921"\w* people; let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hearts go flowing \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* safe place. (Selah.)

Truly \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* low birth \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* high position \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H6256"\w* what \w they|strong="H6256"\w* seem; if \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w put|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scales \w together|strong="H5971"\w* \w they|strong="H6256"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* less \w than|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H6256"\w* breath.

\w Have|strong="H0376"\w* no faith \w in|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* rewards \w of|strong="H1121"\w* evil-doing, \w or|strong="H0120"\w* \w in|strong="H0376"\w* profits wrongly \w made|strong="H5927"\w*: \w if|strong="H0376"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* wealth \w is|strong="H0376"\w* increased, do \w not|strong="H1121"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w your|strong="H5927"\w* hopes \w on|strong="H0389"\w* \w it|strong="H1121"\w*.

Once \w has|strong="H3820"\w* God said, twice \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* come \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* ears, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w power|strong="H2428"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* God's:

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* mercy, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* Lord, \w is|strong="H0430"\w* yours, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0259"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* reward \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* work.
